headline.print_headline: ‘Bloomberg: The Musical’: He’s Not Calling the Tunes
headline.main: ‘Bloomberg: The Musical’: He’s Not Calling the Tunes

docs.abstract: Musical-theater composers Marcy Heisler, Joe Iconis and Lynne Ahrens, inspired by Encores! revival of 1959 musical Fiorello! about Mayor Fiorello H La Guardia, imagine song-and-dance numbers for a musical about Mayor Michael R Bloomberg.

keywords.value: Encores! Great American Musicals in Concert (Series)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: With Encores! bringing back “Fiorello!,” about Mayor Fiorello H. La Guardia, three composers imagine song-and-dance numbers for a Michael R. Bloomberg  musical.
docs.snippet: With Encores! bringing back “Fiorello!,” about Mayor Fiorello H. La Guardia, three composers imagine song-and-dance numbers for a Michael R. Bloomberg  musical.
